attributes.action: I need a law to make fathers pay the child support they owe.
attributes.background: It's too easy in this country for fathers to hide behind being self employed and not pay the child maintenance they owe. Must cost the government millions helping support me. My children get £5 off their father per day whilst he is able to go on holidays, build conservatories etc. We struggle to eat

rejection.details: There are already legal sanctions for people who don't pay the child support they owe. It's therefore not clear what you would like to change.
